    • Partnership

    Shine your community & power up your event

    Let's do it together!

    Partner with us

    Whether you're a company, meetup, or individual planner — Or you're responsible for your company resevation system — We'd love to support your work. Join us in managing the next generation of activities and events — and empowering the big ideas and coaches behind them.

    Enhance your competition

    If you organize competitions on a regular basis or once a year, you'll be happy to know MySpotBook will give you full support on it. We'll provide you with a simple but tailor-made solution to your needs which extends upon the power of MySpotBook, and we'll let our community of organizers with common interests know about your next big championship.
